name: Ryo Nagano
detail:
2006年にAPOGEE（アポジー）のVocal & Guitarとしてメジャーデビュー、音楽活動を開始。
2010年よりソロ活動を開始、CM音楽作家としても活躍中。 2011年6月6日にソロデビューアルバム「はじめよう」をリリース。

An eclectic singer, songwriter, composer and guitarist based in Tokyo, Japan, Ryo Nagano is originally from Hiroshima. His career in music started in 2006 when he debuted as the vocal & guitarist of rock band “APOGEE”. Highly acclaimed, the rock band was welcomed as one of a kind band with strong influence from 80’s rock & popular music. The band was also one of a kind in it’s productions like music videos and CD designs, winning awards like MTV music awards for best effects and best director. In 2009 Ryo started his solo sessions and in 2010, began his career as a composer/vocalist for TV ads and other film related music. Currently he performs on monthly basis at live houses in and around Tokyo. He will release his first solo album "Hajimeyou" in June 2012.
